title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1100.8 - Appeal
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1100.8 - Appeal

State Regulations

Any applicant denied access to a record for whatever reason
may appeal such denial decision by directing a written appeal to Norma M. Wedlake, Executive Director of the New York State Temporary Commission to

Revise the Social Services Law, Room 944, Legislative Office Building, Albany, New York 12224 (518) 472-8300. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1100.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
